response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 7500}
